pages.title: Scrolls
pages.text: Scrolls can be found in chests, looted from mobs, or crafted. Each Scroll contains a spell with a level, similar to an enchanted book. Likewise, scrolls can be upgraded in the Arcane Anvil like enchanted books.

Scrolls can be used to cast their spell on their own, subverting mana costs and cooldown, but consuming the scroll in the process. Primarily, they are inscribed into spell books for continued use, so long as the spell book is powerful enough to hold the scroll (determined by rarity).
